channel.title: Pages on Fediversity
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Fediversity

item.title: Developers
item.description: The Fediversity Project enables easy hosting for a wide variety of fediverse platforms, all based on NixOS.

item.title: European Commission
item.description: The Fediversity project implements the visions outlined by the Next Generation Internet (NGI) initiative for an open internet in several ways.

item.title: Fediversity
item.description: Fediversity is a comprehensive effort to bring easy-to-use, hosted cloud services with service portability and personal freedom at their core to everyone.

item.title: Grants
item.description: Fediversity invites other people to join this ambitious development effort. It is a vast domain with many more challenges than what any preconceived effort could tackle by itself.

item.title: Individuals
item.description: The fediverse shows great potential in fundamentally rethinking how we approach the internet.

item.title: NLnet
item.description: The NLnet Foundation supports organisations and people who contribute to an open internet for all.

item.title: NORDUnet
item.description: NORDUnet is a collaboration of the National Research and Education Networks of the Nordic countries connecting universities and research institutions across Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway, and Sweden.

item.title: Open Internet Discourse Foundation
item.description: The Open Internet Discourse Foundation (OID) is founded on the belief that everyone deserves the freedom to express themselves and use the internet without constraints, and is committed to help build a better internet where individuals can truly be who they are.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: The Fediversity website does not track you, and does not process any of your data.

item.title: Tweag
item.description: Tweag is the open source program office (OSPO) of Modus Create, a global digital consulting firm that helps enterprises build competitive advantage through digital innovation.
